title: Reservoir for a tree and plant watering system

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for a reservoir for a tree and plant watering system, as shown and described.

description: FIG.1 is a perspective view of the reservoir for a tree and plant watering system;
FIG. 2 is a plan view of the bottom of the reservoir of FIG. 1;
FIG. 3 is a front elevational view of the reservoir of FIG. 1;
FIG. 4 is an elevational view of one side of the reservoir of FIG. 1 and a mirror image of the other side;
FIG. 5 is a plan view of the top of the reservoir of FIG. 1; and,
FIG. 6 is a side view of the top of the reservoir of FIG. 1.
The sides of the reservoir top are identical. The broken lines are show the environment of the design and form no part of the design.
